metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6313 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Integer underflow in the load_resources function in io-icns.c in gdk-pixbuf allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and program crash) via a crafted image entry size in an ICO file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gdkpixbuf-2.0 - 2.32.2-1ubuntu1.4
libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0 - 2.32.2-1ubuntu1.4
libgdk-pixbuf2.0-common - 2.32.2-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gdk-pixbuf package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.32.2-1ubuntu1.4').
